description:
Super-stylish and radically functional. Upgraded with Smith’s MAG lens changing system, the I/O Mag Goggles make swapping lenses even easier. The rimless design keeps the lens readily accessible and not tucked within a frame, so you can switch lenses quickly when conditions change after lunch.

  • Designed for medium faces
  • MAG lens changing system combines 8 N52 magnets with a lens carrier locking mechanism. Adding a locking carrier to the MAG system prevents the lens from experiencing any rotational shift and adds an extra measure of retention over magnets alone. A simple push of one lever at either side of the lens releases the lens for easy swapping
  • ChromaPop® lenses deliver exceptional clarity, high contrast and dynamic colour optimization, making them great for challenging light conditions
  • Spherical Carbonic-X lens has crisp TLT optics and a 5X anti-fog inner lens
  • Thermal lens with Porex™ pressure-equalizing filter eliminates distortion and fog during rapid elevation changes
  • Smith’s Responsive Fit™ design makes the frame very flexible without losing strength, allowing it to adjust to contours of a variety of face shapes while reducing weight
  • Articulating outrigger system allows for comfortable, pressure-free wear, with or without a helmet
  • 3-layer DriWix foam provides a comfortable, breathable seal
  • Wide, silicone backed strap has a quick-fit adjustment system and a clip buckle
  • Includes a spare ChromaPop Storm Rose with 50% visible light transmission
  • Includes an extra lens and a microfibre goggle bag
name: Smith I/O Mag Goggles - Unisex

specs.key: Visible Light Transmission (Black/CP Everyday Red Mir)
Visible Light Transmission (Ac | Tnf X Austin Smith/C)
